Text: DEAR DEEPAK (ZYX55E) SAHEB. A HELL LOT OF THANKS FOR ALL THESE MARVELLOUS UPLOADS FROM U. THOGHT OF WRITING INDIVUAL COMMENTS ON EACH AND EVERY UPLOAD BUT IS NOT POSSIBLE OWING TO SO MANY OF YOUR GEMS. I CAN ONLY EXPRESS MY HEARTFELT THANKS FOR THE SELFLESS SERVICE U R DOIN FOR MOVIE AFFICIOANADOS LIKE ME - BEST RGDS - LOVEPAREEK.
Pareek bhai thx a ton for ur nice n encouraging comments.
